name: Ricetta: chop suey di Zhongyuan
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Zhongyuan Chop Suey.

value.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Pesce
value.desc: Un filetto di pesce fresco. Se trattato in modo appropriato, pu√≤ diventare un piatto prelibato.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

value.name: Sale
value.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

value.name: Chop suey di Zhongyuan
value.desc: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Though it contains animal organ meat and bits and scraps of other things, the strong-flavored seasonings have masked the stench of the meat. Many have had this dish for the entirety of their lives without knowing "chop suey" is not actually a swear word in the local language.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from the World Quest "Old Tastes Die Hard"</color>
